hero_subtitle:
Bioinformatics Researcher
Bacterial Genomics & Genome Annotation
about_text: I am a bioinformatics researcher focused on bacterial genome assembly, annotation, and functional genomics. My work combines biological insight with computational analysis to explore stress tolerance mechanisms in bacteria.
service1_desc: De novo and hybrid genome assembly using modern bioinformatics pipelines.
service2_desc: Functional annotation using Prokka, eggNOG, and curated databases.
service3_desc: Basic comparative genomics and functional profiling.
services_note: Additional bioinformatics services are under development.
project1_desc: Genome assembly, annotation, and stress gene analysis.
project2_desc: Plasmid analysis and functional gene annotation.
